summary: The Department of Transportation awarded over $1.5 billion in grants for nationally significant freight and highway projects for 2017-2018. We reviewed its grants process. We found DOT's application reviews for the Infrastructure for Rebuilding America program lacked consistency and transparency. For example, after DOT found 97 applications were missing information, it followed up with 42. It did not sufficiently document why it only contacted some...
title: Discretionary Transportation Grants: Actions Needed to Improve Consistency and Transparency in DOT's Application Evaluations
